name: The Foster Paradox
description:
In a visual novel taking place in a cyberpunk future, follow Foster as he recalls one of the many adventures he and his ragtag team of mercenaries partook in. 

Made in Fitchburg State's Mobile Game Design class. 

Team:

Kris Camp - Director/Character Artist

Chris Hickman - Programmer/Background Artist

Dan Hill - Level Designer/Programmer/Scene Management

Tori Croteau - Lighting Designer/Character Artist/Lois Griffin

This game was built and tested for android, pc build might be buggy!
